channel.title: Workflowy on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Workflowy on Yet Another Geographer

item.description: I simply wasn’t as efficient with others as I was with workflowy. The ease of use, the speed, the interface… all superior for just a simple outlining tool. It’s not open source, but it’s so well designed. This kills me. If I could get HackFlowy working with tags and external port forwarding, I would leave. But, for now, I’l consign myself to the proprietary beast. imported from: yetanothergeographer
